channel.title: samba on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in samba on Just a Memo

item.title: Samba
item.description: 配置文件 smb.conf filename: /etc/samba/smb.conf [global] workgroup = home server string = mini server role = standalone server hosts allow = 192.168.0. 192.168.1. 192.168.6. 127. security = user log file = /var/log/samba/log.%m max log size = 50 interfaces = 192.168.0.199 127.0.0.1 dns proxy = no [homes] comment = Home Directories valid users = %S read only = No path = %H/samba create mask = 0644 directory mask =
